title: Fan, ca. 1860
medium:
Medium: ivory, paper, silk
Technique: carved, painted
description: Fan with ivory blades and paper leaf. Leaf painted on front and back with scenes of Chinese life. Faces of figures are painted on small bits of applied ivory. Garments of figures are made of silk applied to the paper leaf. The sticks are lace-carved with flowers, figures, etc. Guards are carved in high relief.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan, ca. 1860.
ca. 1860. Medium: ivory, paper, silk
Technique: carved, painted. Gift of Clarence Hoblitzelle. 1912-10-2.
